The next iPhone… 4G?

19 Apr 2010 . . Comments #3g #Camera Flash #featured #Gizmodo #Goodies #Hd #Iphone #Iphone 4g #Next Gen Iphone #Next Generation #Photos #Redwood City #Storage Space

Gizmodo has an exclusive… The iPhone 4G preview

You can’t really get much more convincing than this.

Gizmodo has posted video and pics of the next gen iPhone. Will it be called the 4G or HD? Who knows. But if we are to trust this, it looks like we’ll be getting a camera flash, front facing camera, as well as more storage space plus other goodies. All the things that I am looking for in an upgrade from my 3G this summer. I like the flat back design also. Nice.

Now who left this thing lying around in a bar in Redwood City??

Full article from Gizmodo here.
